properties.Observatio: This spring is located in an area owned by the tea estate. Therefore, required to allocating a reservation, This community water project is operating using this spring and distributes water to 310 families. No water treatment plant has been built for wat
properties.Descriptio:
Marking boundaries - Around the reservation

Construction of water treatment unite - size 3.0m x 2.0m x 1.5m 

Contingencies 10%

properties.Observatio: The Community Water Project distributes water to 50 families.
properties.Descriptio:
Plant 20 no of Kumbuk trees around the spring

Supplying of Kumbuk seedlings [to be planted in 3.5m x 3.5m grid]

Supplying of NPK fertilizer [0.10kg/plant]

Ground preparation & maintenance [7 L/days per 100.0m x 2.0m]

Planting & fertilizer application
